definition: to order/to enjoin/to charge/to instruct sb to finish sth
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: those who do not make the corrections within the time limit, shall be ordered to stop construction, and can be imposed with penalty simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 逾期不改正的，責令停止施工，可以並處罰款。

sentences.english: He was given a conditional discharge and ordered to pay compensation.
sentences.chinese: 他被有條件地釋放了，被責令支付賠償款。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court did not hand down a sentence, but ordered the Appeals Court to re-examine the case.
sentences.chinese: 但最高法院沒有宣佈判決，而是責令上訴庭複議此案。

sentences.english: Second, we may order less or smaller dishes in the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 第二，我們可以責令少或小碗在餐廳。

sentences.english: Then in the fall, news organizations were ordered to stop writing about it.
sentences.chinese: 直到秋天，新聞機構才被責令停止對這件事的爭論。

sentences.english: Both teenagers pled guilty and were ordered to pay for the damage.
sentences.chinese: 兩個青少年都被判有罪，並被責令賠償損失。

sentences.english: Police ordered the club to close its doors for 3 months and pay a fine of RMB20000 for the illegal practice, according to Xinhua.
sentences.chinese: 警方已責令該夜總會停業整頓3個月，罰款2萬元。

sentences.english: The embezzler was severely punished and enjoined to kick back a portion of the stolen money each month.
sentences.chinese: 貪污犯受到了嚴厲懲罰，並被責令每月退還部分贓款。

sentences.english: The judge told him to desist from threatening his wife.
sentences.chinese: 法官責令他別再威脅他妻子。

sentences.english: Chen has been suspended from his position.
sentences.chinese: 據悉，陳立巖已被責令停職。

sentences.english: They ordered photographers to delete all the photos and then released them after criticism.
sentences.chinese: 警方責令攝影者刪除照片，並進行批評教育將其遣散。

sentences.english: The applicant sought judicial review to quash the bind-over order.
sentences.chinese: 申請人請求司法審理以便廢除責令某人守法的命令。

sentences.english: The steel factory was ordered to halt production after the accident.
sentences.chinese: 事故發生後，港陸公司被責令停產整頓。

sentences.english: The pub has been ordered to suspend business.
sentences.chinese: 涉案歌舞廳已被責令停業。

sentences.english: Whether ordering the respondent to suspend the relevant act would prejudice the public interests.
sentences.chinese: 責令被申請人停止有關行爲是否損害社會公共利益。
